snippet: The playoffs were only hours old when they produced a tumultuous episode in Nashville, where Predators defenseman Shea Weber smashed the head of Red Wings forward Henrik Zetterberg against the glass.
abstract: The playoffs were only hours old when they produced a tumultuous episode in Nashville, where Predators defenseman Shea Weber smashed the head of Red Wings forward Henrik Zetterberg against the glass.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Mild Punishment for a Vicious Hit
